text: Giulietto Chiesa (4 September 1940 â€“ 26 April 2020) was an Italian journalist, author, lecturer and politician. He was born in Acqui Terme, Piedmont. He served as a member of the European Parliament from 2004 to 2009. Chiesa died on 26 April 2020 at the age of 79. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1940 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Italian journalists Category:MEPs for Italy Category:Writers from Piedmont Category:Politicians from Piedmont
